name: Gate 03 — DIMKUR · KA · GU-ZA-LUH
description: From the Measures of Inanna series (Volume I). Gate 03 is the Gate of the Breastplate Beads — the surrender of protection, ornament, and the symbolic armor of status. Here, Inanna releases the adornments that once signaled her station and guarded her heart. DIMKUR · KA · GU-ZA-LUH marks the offering of authority’s frontpiece, the softening of defense, and the revelation of presence without shield or display. This plate bears witness to the moment where strength becomes openness.

attributes.value: The Gate of the Breastplate Beads
